title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item does not get selected on the first attempt.

OB: Item cannot be selected in the library outline view on the first attempt.

EB: Item should be able to be selected in the library outline view on the first attempt.

SR: 
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Verify whether the label item is selected or not.
